job_title: SMTS - High Bandwidth Memory Input Output (I/O) Circuit Design Engineer

job_description:
• Full life cycle system design and ownership including collecting requirements, signal chain simulations, schematic design, component selection, supervision or completion of layout, bring-up, test, debug and system integration.
• Design and evaluate complex multi-chip designs and architectures from DC to 55GHz+Identify viable architectures, complete system and chip-level design trades including frequency planning, spur analysis, phase noise, gain, IP2/IP3, and noise figure performance.
• Review multilayer printed circuit boards paying attention to high-speed effects, signal flow, and proper design rule adherence.
• Design for test (DFT) definition & development to improve testability, quality and reduce cost.
• Design test fixturing to allow for full product characterization.
• Perform research and analysis on the best design techniques for specific product challenges.
• Develop and implement system improvements, modifications, and upgrades.
• Own and oversee hardware and system bring up, development of test plan and protocols, debug, evaluation, and validation in a lab environment.
